moduleMetadataJson.name: Windows Gather Active Directory User Comments
moduleMetadataJson.description:
This module will enumerate user accounts in the default Active Domain (AD) directory which
        contain 'pass' in their description or comment (case-insensitive) by default. In some cases,
        such users have their passwords specified in these fields.
author: Ben Campbell <eat_meatballs@hotmail.co.uk>

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: SESSION
options.description: The session to run this module on.

options.name: DOMAIN
options.description: The domain to query or distinguished name (e.g. DC=test,DC=com)

options.name: MAX_SEARCH
options.description: Maximum values to retrieve, 0 for all.
